mainText:
He was amazing to me even before I learned about him when I only knew of 
him as the Creator of Apple Inc. Starting Apple as well as  an other 
computer/technology company as well as taking hold of Pixar is an 
amazing set of feats.

The world really has lost an amazing human being, and Apple really has 
lost a visionary and creative genius with true depth of vision.

May he rest in peace.
author: Andrew
